metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6240 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The chroot, jail, and zone connection plugins in ansible before 1.9.2 allowlocal users to escape a restricted environment via a symlink attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6240` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.9.2+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2+dfsg-2').
